string-array.name: protocol_description
string-array.item: Best configuration of speed and security
Select when UDP doesn’t work TCP

string-array.name: firewall_description
string-array.item: (Default) - Firewall will be enabled when you connect and disables when you disconnect from a location. It will remain on if your connection suddenly drops
Firewall is always on, and cannot be disabled unless You change this setting. You will not have any Internet access when you’re disconnected from Cypherpunk Network.

string-array.name: encryption_description
string-array.item: Best combination of speed and security
Proprietary Encryption best for bypassing restrictive network firewalls such as The Great Firewall of China
